name: Sun Wing
description:
Submission to Mini Jam 88, the theme was Rush and the limitation was to tell a story without text. So that's all the text you're getting.

WASD to move, ESC to pause.

Credits

Programming by Small Bug Games
Lead Artist and sound designer MetaphysicalMonsters
Backgrounds by Vito the Frog

All sound effects from Freesound.com
